Content.Question:
Assistant: Good morning. Can I help you?
Ross: Yes. Can you give me some information about the town?
Assistant: Certainly. What are you interested in particularly?
Ross: Well, it’s my second day here
and I'd like to look round some of your historic buildings.
Assistant: Well, there’s the Cathedral …
Ross: Ah, I've already been there.
Assistant: Oh … right. And there’s the Castle …
Ross: Actually I’ve just come back
from there. Can you recommend somewhere else?
Assistant: Have you visited the Museum yet?
Ross: No, I haven't. That sounds interesting. Where is it?
Assistant: It’s on Swan Street, quite near to the Castle. You can't miss it.
Ross: Oh … it’s not open today. It says it’s closed on Mondays.
Assistant: Oh that’s right. I forgot. How stupid of me. Well, I don’t know what to say. I think you've been to our most famous sites.
Ross: I haven't been on the river yet.
Assistant: Ah yes. You can get a boat on the river. You can hire it from here.
